casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Downing, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Downing, 124 Ohio St.3d 475, 2010-Ohio-716.]

(No. 2008-2009 Submitted January 13, 2010 Decided March 4, 2010.)

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Singleton, 124 Ohio St.3d 173, 2009-Ohio-6434, 920 N.E.2d 958.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton and Lanzinger, JJ., dissent for the reasons stated in the dissenting opinion of Lanzinger, J., in State v. Singleton. *476Ron O’Brien, Franklin County Prosecuting Attorney, and Seth L. Gilbert and Sheryl L. Prichard, Assistant Prosecuting Attorneys, for appellant. Shaw & Miller, Mark J. Miller, and Douglas W. Shaw, for appellee.
